articles.title: Google Confirms Gmail Warning—3 Billion Users Must Now Act - Forbes
articles.description: Do not lose your account—do this now.

articles.title: Nintendo isn’t retiring Diddy Kong and here’s why - Nintendo Everything
articles.description: There have been some scattered claims going around lately saying that Nintendo is phasing out Diddy Kong, for one reason or another. If you have no idea what we’re talking about, that’s completely understandable. This claim is mostly attributed to the dormanc…

articles.title: Paul Rudd Hypes Nintendo Switch 2 With Playful Throwback to Infamous 90s SNES Commercial - IGN
articles.description: Nintendo has tapped actor Paul Rudd to hype up the Nintendo Switch 2 in a brand new commercial that pays corny-yet-adorable homage to a beloved 90s commercial he did for the Super Nintendo.

articles.title: Nintendo Switch 2 pre-orders begin April 24 in the US, accessory prices hiked - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com
articles.description: Expect to pay a handful more dollars for that controller set. Nintendo has announced that its Switch 2 console will begin retail pre-orders on April 24,...

articles.title: Widespread Microsoft Entra lockouts tied to new security feature rollout - BleepingComputer
articles.description: Windows administrators from numerous organizations report widespread account lockouts triggered by false positives in the rollout of a new Microsoft Entra ID's "leaked credentials" detection app called MACE.

articles.title: Synology is tightening restrictions on third-party NAS hard drives - The Verge
articles.description: Synology will introduce new restrictions on third-party hard drives with new NAS systems later this year that could make first-party drives essential.
